Name: Lone Land
About the game: Don't be afraid of heights to find the way out. Lone Land puts you in the role of an unknown protagonist in an unknown land that reveals itself along your path. With a story told through the environment, Lone Land will bring you reflection, calm, and relaxation. Jump, run, jump and use your own abilities to get out of this lonely land.
